item.description:
Dear Jumbos

Let's get together for a little Thai Food on Thursday October 21 at Sei Bar on Main Street in Medford. The place has terrific and reasonably-priced luncheon specials like chicken with ginger & scallions or spicy peanut beef served with miso soup, a spring roll, and steamed rice. Check out the full menu at:

Sei Bar Luncheon Menu

The menu also features Sushi and other Asian Cuisine such as tempura and several vegetarian options as well.

Naturally, we'll either split the check fairly or get separate checks for attendees. The restaurant is a few blocks from the George Street building, but those of us on the hill will probably want to drive or carpool. Although the restaurant does not have a parking lot, I have always been able to find street parking on Columbus Road, a side street right next to the Restaurant.

If you have any questions, feel free to shoot me an email at: rich.kelley@tufts.edu. I hope to see you at Sei.

Warm regards,
Rich
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Tufts Faculty-Staff Meet-up sign on my table.
item.name: Thai Food Thursday
